definition: proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: By loading doubting operator D on a proposition, we obtain a doubting proposition.
sentences.chinese: 將懷疑算子D加於命題之上就構成懷疑命題。

sentences.english: By loading doubting operator D on a proposition, we obtain a doubting proposition.
sentences.chinese: 將懷疑算子D加於命題之上就構成懷疑命題。

sentences.english: The classical proposition logic is the basis of modern formal logic.
sentences.chinese: 經典命題邏輯是現代形式邏輯的基礎。

sentences.english: Sensitivity and rationality, just like life and death, are complicated issues in life.
sentences.chinese: 感性與理性就如同生與死是人生一道難解的命題。

sentences.english: Security is a difficult but necessary proposition for any application.
sentences.chinese: 對於任何應用程序，安全是一個困難但必要的命題。

sentences.english: Thus prepositional logic can only expressparts of the logic rules.
sentences.chinese: 由此可見，命題邏輯只反映了一部分邏輯規律。

sentences.english: Free composition as an exercise has its limitation.
sentences.chinese: 作爲練習的自由命題的作文有其侷限性。

sentences.english: Figure of equivalence of ⑶ propositional logic.
I had to say very carefully   three theses   right?
sentences.chinese: 我必須十分小心地說是，三個命題，對不？

sentences.english: Find on what foundation the proposition bottoms.
sentences.chinese: 找出這個命題建立在什麼基礎上。

sentences.english: Quality-oriented education is a topic with distinctive characteristics of the times and important theoretical value.
sentences.chinese: 素質教育是具有鮮明時代特徵和重要理論價值的命題。

sentences.english: Return to the theme or themes in the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 回到命題或者介紹部分提到的事物。

sentences.english: The major or minor term of a syllogism.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨三段論的大前提和小前提必然得到的命題。

sentences.english: International institution and international cooperation are the key topics of Neo-Liberal Institutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 國際制度和國際合作是新自由制度主義的核心命題。

sentences.english: Considering this reason, the author select this topic.
sentences.chinese: 正是籍於此選擇了這一命題。

sentences.english: The destiny of the land-holding farmers is a long-lasting topic in modern society.
sentences.chinese: 自耕農的歷史命運是現代化理論中非常重要的命題。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
